coreAttributes.name: Meat Weed
coreAttributes.description: A purple Bullrush like plant that is known to make Spitbugs as a precaution you have to enchant it to activate its transformative properties. It has imported by "Merra Imports.Inc". "Caution this plant has been know to be very addictive and as such should be only eaten in small quantities. M.I.I is not responsible for actions that take place if you become a spitbug when consuming an enchanted product".

[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/2)]
